title: LUP
name: Intrastate IntraLATA Usage Percentage
definition: Identifies the percent Intrastate IntraLATA usage for use with IntraLATA competition.
fieldNotes: This field may apply whenever PIU is less than 100.
usageNotes:
Prohibited when the PIU field is not populated or is "100". 
Prohibited when the first position of the REQTYP field is "R". 
Prohibited when the ACT field is "D". 
Otherwise optional.
